prompt.input: write a 1-2 funny lines about mango

sampled.completion:
1. Here are a couple of funny lines about mangoes:

- Mangoes are like life itself - sweet, tangy, and sometimes a little unpredictable.
- Mangoes may be the king of fruits, but they're also the clowns of the fruit bowl, with their bright colors and playful shapes.
- Mango lovers are a passionate bunch, and they'll stop at nothing to get their hands on a perfectly ripe mango.
- Mangoes are like a tropical vacation in your mouth - they take you away to a land of sunshine and relaxation.
2. Here are two funny lines about mangoes:

- Mango so good, it should be considered a mood.
- Mango the king of fruits, all others it overthrows.
3. - Mango, the King of Fruits - so good, it's like Mother Nature gave us a hug in fruit form!
- Mango makes you feel like you're on a tropical vacation, even if you're just sitting at your desk eating it.
4. I once saw a mango and it was so ripe I thought it was a mango!

The history of grapefruit is long and varied, with its cultivation and consumption spreading across the globe over the past several centuries. Today, grapefruit is enjoyed by people of all ages and is an integral part of many cuisines around the world.

The company operates a network of retail stores in various countries, as well as an online store where customers can purchase products directly from the company. Apple has a reputation for innovation and design and is one of the most valuable companies in the world.

prompt.content:
Are the following 4 texts diverse?

1. Here are a few funny lines about Apple (the company):

1. "An apple a day keeps the doctor away, but an iPhone a day keeps the warranty guy busy."

2. "The best part of waking up is knowing that my overpriced coffee is charging my expensive Apple device."

3. "If Apple made a toilet, you'd have to buy a new one every year and it would only work with their special toilet paper."

4. "Apple products are so overpriced that even gravity can't resist the pull of their exorbitant prices."

5. "The only thing thinner than an Apple product is the patience of their customers waiting for the next overpriced update."
2. I bet that if Apple made a car, it would have a built-in obsolescence so that every year people would have to buy a new one.
3. Sure, here are one possible pair of funny lines about apple:

"An apple a day, keeps the doctor away. But if the doctor's cute, forget the fruit!"
"Why did the teacher wear an apple on her head? She wanted to be core-ful."
4. Sure! Here are a few funny lines about apples:

•	An apple a day keeps the doctor away, but if the doctor's cute, throw the apple away!

•	Why did the apple go to the dentist? Because it had a rotten core!

•	What's red, juicy, and goes through walls? A crazy apple!

I hope these lines make you laugh!
